column5: terrible news.  I often wonder how two people drown but I guess when your drinking anything can happen. Stay safe everyone
Sad story..  You have to be very careful with boats and alcohol, especially in a remote location...
No life jackets...cold water will kill you quickly.
Sad for sure. It continues to happen every year, year in year out. We just won't learn from others mistakes. The family names sound familiar to me.
Cold water + alcohol + no PFDs. That's not tragic, it's nearly inevitable.
My thoughts exactly. An accident waiting to happen. Too bad, it happens all to often.  S.
